lines.text: Who's ever after you are real pros.
I guess I should be proud, it would be embarrassing to be killed by an amateur.
No one tried to kill me! This is Miami. I'm local. We only shoot the tourists.
[Rosa is bringing in a Caffe Romano pizza]
Hey, babe! If you were Dominos, I'd get a discount.
If I were Dominos, you'd still be alive.
[Shoots him]
[Max is on the phone with a convenience store clerk and Ilya Kazak]
Why don't you drop that bullshit American accent.

[sounding American]
I don't know what you mean.
Dosvedanya, Asshole!
Dosve... WHAT!

[normal voice]
Dosvedanya, Asshole?
Yo man, fuck YOU and fuck whoever ELSE on the phone!
[hangs up]
Clever BASTARD!
[hangs up]
[Max has called his cousin Jodi and got the answering machine]

[on the machine]
Hello. You have reached the number of Detective Kirkpatrick's meddling relative. Cousin Jodi cannot answer the phone right now, but if you wish to leave a message, please contact your nearest psychic.
[scream from Jodi, gunshot]
Dosvedanya to you, *asshole*!
I can't believe it. They used their cellphone. It's like painting a huge bullseye on your ass!
[Rosa and Max are fighting on the beach. Rosa just kicked him in the groin]
Ahh. Did that hurt you? Poor little baby. Let Mommy kick it for you and make it *better*!
[kicks him again]
[after dumping a ton of mail on Max's desk]

THIS is your mail because it has your name on it! My mail is sometimes addressed to OCCUPANT. Because, Max, I AM the fucking occupant of my place! Whereas YOU are no longer an occupant. Is this sinking in? GET YOUR SHIT OUT OF MY APARTMENT!
Please, Rita. Just cut me a little slack on space, OK.
No, no, no! You have run out of slacks, Max! No more slacks for you!

[after Juantorena failed to kill Kate with the home explosion]
I'm getting most annoyed by your petty incompetence.
Hey, you seem to forget you tap phones for a living, I tap banks!
[Kazak cocks his .45]
If it wasn't for me you'd be stuck in Havana pulling bananas out of your ass!

[realizes a gun is pointed at his head]
Oh, what. You're going to shoot me.
Yes.
[shoots him]
You! You know how to use a computer as well as him.
DA!
[after using his computer's keyboard to subdue an armed man]
So, a computer *is* good for something after all.
[confronting Kazak on the Tortuga]
You killed my partner, my cousin, my crew...

[mockingly]
Ssssssorry.
You really have no conscience, do you?
Oh, I can't afford the luxury of a conscience.
[to his guards]
Kill him!
[Kate's credit card transaction shows up on his computer]
She's using her credit card again. Typical Americans.
When did she become a 'they'?
She is with the cop. And he's very good. He took out our whole goddamn team!
So, genius, have you ever pissed off the KGB?
KGB?

The Russian letter for Z looks like a 3. So 33 means ZZ which means Zapatnya Zabov, which means "Death to the West". They were based out of Cuba to strike Western targets. *They* being KGB Away Teams.
[beat]
They were the Navy SEALS of the Spy World. Wet Works, Black Bag Jobs, Electronic Surveillance, if it was bad, these guys did it!
Fuck DID, they're DOING! And they're *right on my ass*!
Avoid anything that leaves electronic footprints because they WILL find it! Seriously, these people can crawl into your living room and pick your nose for you.
[Kazak has captured Kate]

When I ran the KGB out of Cuba, I helped some... politically incorrect people hide billions of dollars in various Free World accounts, but I kept the account numbers. Magic numbers. Now, your client's husband, may he rest in peace, knew the secrets of banking, while I knew the secrets of phone lines. A match made in heaven. So when the time was right I could use those magic numbers and HELP MYSELF! But then you had to come along and FUCK IT UP!

[nervous]
Are you looking for hardware... or is it software you're interested in?

[sexy]
Hardware. I was hoping to demo your unit.
I'd have to... boot up first.

[sexy]
Well, why... don'cha?
Max, you obviously got me confused with someone who gives a rat's ass.
You know that they call a Florida cop in a three-piece suit?
No. What?
The defendant!
Is it a felony to shoot a computer?
Only in California.
Hello pigs!
Don't do shh... to me. I am not...
shh...
Do I look like a warehouse?
